text: Abhinav Bindra (born September 28, 1982, in Dehradun) is an Indian amateur athlete and businessman. He is best known as the current World and Olympic champion in the 10 m Air Rifle event. At the Beijing Olympic Games, he became the first Indian to win an individual Olympic gold medal.Timmons, Heather.
